body.when: Any phase, just after you make an Advance roll, a Charge roll, a Desperate Escape test or a Hazardous test for a unit from your army, or a Hit roll, a Wound roll, a Damage roll or a saving throw for a model in that unit, or a roll to determine the number of attacks made with a weapon equipped by a model in that unit. body.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move.
body.target: One unit from your army that is within 6" of that enemy unit and would be eligible to declare a charge against that enemy unit if it were your Charge phase.
body.effect: Your unit now declares a charge that targets only that enemy unit, and you resolve that charge as if it were your Charge phase.
body.restriction: You can only select a VEHICLE unit from your army if it is a WALKER. Note that even if this charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

body.when: End of your opponent’s Movement phase.
body.target: One unit from your army that is in Reserves.
body.effect: Your unit can arrive on the battlefield as if it were the Reinforcements step of your Movement phase, and if every model in that unit has the Deep Strike ability, you can set that unit up as described in the Deep Strike ability (even though it is not your Movement phase).
body.restriction: You cannot use this Stratagem to enable a unit to arrive on the battlefield during a battle round it would not normally be able to do so in.

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement or Charge phase, just after an enemy unit is set up or when an enemy unit starts or ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, or declares a charge.
body.target: One unit from your army that is within 24" of that enemy unit and that would be eligible to shoot if it were your Shooting phase.
body.effect: If that enemy unit is visible to your unit, your unit can shoot that enemy unit as if it were your Shooting phase.
body.restriction: You cannot target a TITANIC unit with this Stratagem. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 6 is required to score a hit, irrespective of the attacking weapon’s Ballistic Skill or any modifiers. You can only use this Stratagem once per turn.

cards.title: DEFIANT TO THE LAST

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 2 to the result if that model has the CHARACTER keyword. On a 4+, do not remove it from play; the destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks (when doing so, it is treated as having 1 wound remaining), and is then removed from play.

body.when: Your Фаза стрельбы.
body.target: One PROSECUTORS unit from your army that has just shot.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next turn, while your unit is on the battlefield, that enemy unit is prosecuted. While a unit is prosecuted, each time an ANATHEMA PSYKANA model makes an attack against that unit, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1. While a PSYKER or Battle-shocked unit is prosecuted, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Бросок попадания.

cards.type: Null Maiden Vigil – Strategic Ploy Stratagem

cards.title: DESPERATION’S PRICE

body.when: Any phase, just after an enemy PSYKER unit has either finished using a Psychic ability that targets a unit, or finished making Psychic Attacks.
body.target: One ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit from your army within 18" of that enemy PSYKER unit.
body.effect: That enemy PSYKER unit must take a Leadership test If the test is passed, that PSYKER unit is Battle-shocked; if the test is failed that PSYKER unit suffers 3 mortal wounds and is Battle-shocked.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if your unit has the WALKER keyword. On a 4+, do not remove it from play; The destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks (when doing so, it is assumed to have 1 wound remaining), and is then removed from play.

cards.title: TALONED PINCER

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
body.target: Up to two ADEPTUS CUSTODES units from your army that are within 9" of that enemy unit.
body.effect: Your units can make a Normal move of up to 6".
body.restriction: You cannot select units that are within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units. You can only select two units if one (and only one) of them is an ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit and both are within 6" of each other.

cards.title: SHIELD OF HONOUR

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ANATHEMA PSYKANA INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks, and one other friendly ADEPTUS CUSTODES INFANTRY unit (excluding ANATHEMA PSYKANA units) within 6" of that ANATHEMA PSYKANA INFANTRY unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, any attack that targets your ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit must instead target your other ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit (unless it is not an eligible target).

cards.title: BREACHING BEHEMOTHS

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army (excluding ANATHEMA PSYKANA units) that has not been selected to move this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, models in your unit can move through other models as if they were not there. In addition, any Desperate Escape tests taken for models in your unit are automatically passed.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.

body.effect: Until the end of the turn, each time an attack is made that targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Бросок ранения.

cards.title: STAGED DEATH

body.when: Any phase.
body.target: One HARLEQUINS CHARACTER model from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
body.effect: At the end of the phase, set your model back up on the battlefield as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with half of its starting number of wounds remaining.
body.restriction: Each model can only be targeted with this Stratagem once per battle.

cards.title: BLOODY DANCE

body.when: End of your opponent’s Charge phase.
body.target: One HARLEQUINS INFANTRY or HARLEQUINS MOUNTED unit from your army that is within 6" of one or more enemy units and would be eligible to declare a charge against one or more of those enemy units if it were your Charge phase.
body.effect: Your unit now declares a charge that only targets one or more of those enemy units, and you resolve that charge.
body.restriction: Note that even if this charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

body.target: One DIRE AVENGERS or GUARDIANS unit from your army that has not fired Overwatch this phase and is wholly on the opposite side of that Hatchway from that enemy unit.
body.effect: If that enemy unit is within 9" of and visible to your unit, roll one D6: on a 2-5, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers 2 mortal wounds. body.restriction: Until the end of the turn, your unit cannot fire Overwatch.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.

body.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability. In addition, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to that attack's Ballistic Skill characteristic and/or to the Hit roll.

cards.type: Wraiths of the Void – Battle Tactic Stratagem

cards.title: D-STRIKE

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One WRAITH CONSTRUCT unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Select one closed Hatchway that is visible to and within range of one or more of the ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit. Open that Hatchway and, until the end of the battle, that Hatchway cannot be closed. For each enemy unit within 3" of that Hatchway and wholly on the opposite side of it from your unit, until the start of your next Shooting phase, that enemy unit is stunned. While a unit is stunned, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
body.restriction: Until the end of the phase, your unit is not eligible to shoot.

body.target: One AGENTS OF THE IMPERIUM CHARACTER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Toughness characteristic of models in your unit. In addition, if it is an EVERSOR ASSASSIN unit, until the end of the phase, it has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

cards.title: ENSNARING TRAP

body.when: End of your opponent’s Charge phase.
body.target: One AGENTS OF THE IMPERIUM INFANTRY unit from your army that is within 6" of one or more enemy units and would be eligible to declare a charge against one or more of those enemy units.
body.effect: Your unit can declare a charge. When doing so, you must select one or more of those enemy units as the targets of that charge, and your unit does not receive a Charge bonus this turn. In addition, if it is a CALLIDUS ASSASSIN unit and it makes a Charge move as a result of this Stratagem, until the end of the turn, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

body.when: Your opponent's Movement or Charge phase.

body.when: Any phase.
body.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS CHARACTER unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
body.effect: You can discard 1-3 Miracle dice. At the end of the phase, set the last destroyed model from your unit back up on the battlefield, as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy models. Roll one D3, adding 1 to the result for each Miracle dice you discarded. That model is set back up with that number of wounds remaining (up to its starting number of wounds).
body.restriction: You cannot select SAINT CELESTINE as the target of this Stratagem. You cannot select the same CHARACTER as the target of this Stratagem more than once per battle.

cards.title: CONTEMPT FOR DEATH

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

cards.type: Penitents and Pilgrims – Battle Tactic Stratagem

cards.title: SLICK WITH GORE

body.when: Fight phase, just after an ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army destroys an enemy unit.
body.target: That ADEPTA SORORITAS unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the battle, your unit is slick with gore. In the Battle-shock step of your opponent's Command phase, if an enemy unit that is below its Starting Strength is within 6" of and visible to a unit from your army that is slick with gore, that enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test. If that enemy unit is also Below Half-strength, subtract 1 from that test. This cannot cause a unit to take two Battle-shock tests in the same phase.
body.restriction: You cannot use this Stratagem while a unit from your army that is slick with gore is on the battlefield.

body.when: End of your opponent’s turn.
body.target: Up to two LEGIONES DAEMONICA units from your army that are within your army’s Shadow of Chaos, or one other LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army.

body.when: Start of any Command phase.

body.effect: That objective marker is said to be Corrupted and remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn. cards.title: CAVALCADE OF BLADES

body.when: Your Charge phase, just after a LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit from your army ends a Charge move.
body.target: That LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit, then roll one D6 for each model in your unit that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit, or roll six D6 instead if your unit is a MONSTER unit: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

cards.title: THIEVES OF PAIN

body.when: Any phase, just after an attack or mortal wound is allocated to a model in a LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit from your army (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES).
body.target: That LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit.
body.effect: Select one other friendly LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit that is within 9" of and visible to your unit. Until the end of the phase, while the selected unit is on the battlefield, each time a model in your unit would lose a wound, inflict 1 mortal wound on the selected unit instead.

cards.type: Legion of Excess – Strategic Ploy Stratagem

cards.title: SENSORY EXCRUCIATION

body.when: Your Command phase.
body.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH MONSTER unit from your army that is on the battlefield.
body.effect: Each unit on the battlefield that is within your army’s Shadow of Chaos must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from that test if they are Below Half-strength.Designer’s Note: This Stratagem forces all friendly and enemy units alike within your army’s Shadow of Chaos to take a Battle-shock test. This can allow a Chaos Daemons player to heal units from their army through the Daemonic Terror army rule, at the risk of causing some of their own units to become Battle-shocked.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, enemy units are not considered to be within Engagement Range of your unit for the purposes of selecting targets for, and resolving attacks with, ranged weapons. Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy model is destroyed while its unit is within Engagement Range of your unit, roll one D6: on a 5+, your unit suffers 1 mortal wound after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Roll one D6, then you can spend one Flux token to re-roll the result: until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, on an unmodified Hit roll (after any re-roll) of that result, the attack sequence ends, even if the original Hit roll would have been a Critical Hit.Example: If you roll a 2 and choose to spend one Flux token to re-roll the result, and the re-roll is a 6, then until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, on an unmodified Hit roll of 6 the attack sequence ends, that attack fails to hit and no Critical Hit effects (e.g. Lethal Hits) are resolved.

body.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army within 9" of a HERETIC ASTARTES PSYKER, HERETIC ASTARTES DAEMON PRINCE or HERETIC ASTARTES DAEMON PRINCE WITH WINGS unit from your army.
body.effect: One model in your unit regains up to D3+1 lost wounds. If your unit has the BATTLELINE keyword, you can return up to D3 destroyed models (excluding CHARACTER models) to your unit with their full wounds remaining, instead.

cards.title: IMPERIOUS ADVANCE

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES TERMINATOR unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Select any number of models in your unit. Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by the selected models, and each time you select targets for attacks made by those models, they must target an enemy unit that is wholly on the opposite side of a Hatchway from them.

cards.title: MALIGN WILL

body.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
body.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit takes a Leadership test for the Dark Pacts ability, subtract 1 from the result and, if passed, select one objective marker within 6" of your unit. If there are no enemy units within range of that objective marker (excluding Battle-shocked units], that objective marker is Secured by your army.

cards.title: INFERNAL PATRONS

body.when: Any phase, just after your opponent targets a unit from their army with a Stratagem.
body.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army within 3" of and visible to that enemy unit.
body.effect: That enemy unit must take a Leadership test; if failed, that usage of that Stratagem has no effect (your opponent cannot use that Stratagem again this phase).

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One DAMNED unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Your unit can make a Desperate Pact. If it does, your unit suffers D3 mortal wounds (in addition to any suffered for failing the resulting Leadership test), and until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the melee weapons equipped by models in your unit, and if your unit did not fail the resulting Leadership test when making that Desperate Pact, until the end of the phase, improve the Strength characteristic of those weapons by 1 as well.

body.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: До конца фазы, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, subtracting 1 from the result if it is a DAMNED unit: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. That destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

cards.type: Creations of Bile – Strategic Ploy Stratagem

cards.title: SPECIMENS FOR THE SPIDER

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack that targets a CHARACTER unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll. After your unit has fought, if one or more enemy CHARACTER models were destroyed as a result of those attacks, select one enemy unit within 6" of your unit. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test. If the enemy WARLORD was destroyed as a result of those attacks, each enemy unit within 6" of your unit must take a Battle-shock test instead.

cards.type: Creations of Bile – Strategic Ploy Stratagem

cards.title: SPECIMENS FOR THE SPIDER

body.when: Фаза боя.
body.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: До конца фазы, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack that targets a CHARACTER unit, you can перебросить the Бросок ранения. After your unit has fought, if one or more enemy CHARACTER models were destroyed as a result of those attacks, select one enemy unit within 6" of your unit. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test. If the enemy WARLORD was destroyed as a result of those attacks, each enemy unit within 6" of your unit must take a Battle-shock test instead.

cards.type: Creations of Bile – Strategic Ploy Stratagem

cards.title: DELAYED MUTATIONS

body.when: Your Command phase.
body.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit (excluding DAMNED units) from your army.
body.effect: Your unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. Then select one augmentation (see Experimental Augmentations). Until the start of your next Command phase, models in your unit have the selected augmentation in addition to any other augmentations they have.

cards.type: Creations of Bile – Strategic Ploy Stratagem

body.when: Any phase, just after an enemy model with the Deadly Demise ability (excluding TITANIC models) is destroyed
body.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES CHARACTER unit from your army that was within 18" of that enemy model when it was destroyed.
body.effect: Your opponent does not roll to determine whether mortal wounds are inflicted by their model’s Deadly Demise ability. Instead, mortal wounds are automatically inflicted (if that ability inflicts a random number of mortal wounds, your opponent rolls to determine that number as normal).

body.when: End of your opponent’s Movement phase.
body.target: One HERETIC ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that is not within Engagement range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit that Fell Back this turn and is within 6" of your unit. Your unit can declare a charge as if it were your Charge phase. When doing so, you can only select that enemy unit as the target of that charge (and only if it is an eligible target). Note that even if this charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

cards.title: UNDYING SPITE

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One TERMINATOR unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6. On a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

body.when: Start or end of any turn, when an enemy unit attempts to Seize an objective marker you have Secured.
body.target: One DEATH GUARD unit from your army (excluding CULTISTS and POXWALKERS units) within Contagion Range of that objective marker.
body.effect: Roll one D6: on a 5+, until the end of your next turn, that objective marker remains Secured by your army and you are considered to control it, regardless of how many enemy models are within range of it.
body.restriction: You can only use this Stratagem once per battle round.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One SLAANESH BEASTS, SLAANESH INFANTRY or SLAANESH MOUNTED unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in or Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3". cards.title: DARK APPARITIONS

body.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
body.target: One DAEMONETTES unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves. If it arrives back on the battlefield in the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase using the Deep Strike ability, it can be set up anywhere that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units (instead of more than 9"), provided it is also set up wholly within 9" of one or more friendly EMPEROR’S CHILDREN units.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One EMPEROR’S CHILDREN CHARACTER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: After the attacking unit has shot, your unit can make a Surge move. To do so, roll one D6: each model in your unit can move a distance in inches up to the result, but your unit must end that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit. If your unit is not your army’s Favoured Champions, you can re-roll the dice to determine the distance of its Surge move.

body.when: Any phase.
body.target: One NECRONS INFANTRY CHARACTER model from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.

body.restriction: Each model can only be targeted with this Stratagem once per battle.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One BOYZ unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: After the attacking unit has shot, your unit can make a Go Get ’Em! move. To do so, roll one D6: each model in your unit can move a distance in inches up to the result, but your unit must end that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit. When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit. If your unit contains 10 or more models, you can re-roll the D6 to determine how far your unit can move.

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit is selected to Fall Back.
body.target: One ORKS unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
body.effect: Your unit can fight as if it were the Fight phase, but when doing so, models in your unit can only target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target) and each time a model in your unit makes an attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 6 is required to score a hit.

cards.title: DAKKASTORM

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One SPEED FREEKS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. While targeting a unit within 9", they have the [SUSTAINED HITS 2] ability instead.
body.restriction: A unit cannot be targeted by this and the Blitza Fire Stratagem in the same phase.

body.effect: Select one enemy MONSTER or VEHICLE unit. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and re-roll a Wound roll of 1. body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR unit from your army.

body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: До конца фазы, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, you can перебросить the Бросок ранения.

cards.type: Anvil Siege Force – Battle Tactic Stratagem

cards.title: HAIL OF VENGEANCE

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has resolved its attacks.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that had one or more of its models destroyed as a result of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

cards.title: RIGID DISCIPLINE

body.when: End of the Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Your unit can immediately make a Fall Back move of up to 6".
body.restriction: When making that move, your unit must end that move either wholly within your deployment zone or within range of an objective marker.

cards.title: SITE-TO-SITE TELEPORTATION

body.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
body.target: Up to two KILL TEAM units from your army, or one other ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army, if those units are not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Remove those units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves. Until the end of your next Movement phase, models in those units that do not have the Deep Strike ability have the Deep Strike ability.

cards.title: HERESY BEGETS RETRIBUTION

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
body.target: One CHAPLAIN or JUDICIAR unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit and is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Your unit can make a Retribution move. To do so, roll one D6: models in your unit move a number of inches up to the result, but your unit must end that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit (excluding AIRCRAFT). When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.

cards.title: ONSLAUGHT OF FIRE

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets the closest eligible target within 12", add 1 to the Hit roll. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as the result of any of those attacks, select one of those destroyed models; that destroyed model’s unit must take a Battle-shock test.

cards.title: RAPID EMBARKATION

body.when: End of the Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TRANSPORT unit from your army that has no models embarked within it, and one ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army wholly within 6" of that TRANSPORT.
body.effect: Your INFANTRY unit can embark within that TRANSPORT.
body.restriction: You cannot target an INFANTRY unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, that cannot normally embark within that TRANSPORT, or that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn.

body.target: One DEATHWING unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 if your unit is within range of your Vowed objective marker. On a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

cards.type: Inner Circle Task Force – Strategic Ploy Stratagem

cards.title: RELIC TELEPORTARIUM

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One DEATHWING unit from your army that is arriving using the Deep Strike ability this phase.
body.effect: Your unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy models.
body.restriction: Until the end of the turn, your unit is not eligible to declare a charge.

body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit that is below its Starting Strength, that attack has the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability, and when making such an attack, if the attacking model is a VEHICLE, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

body.when: Any phase, just after an ADEPTUS ASTARTES VEHICLE model from your army with the Deadly Demise ability is destroyed.
body.target: That ADEPTUS ASTARTES VEHICLE model. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
body.effect: Do not roll one D6 to determine whether mortal wounds are inflicted by your model’s Deadly Demise ability. Instead, mortal wounds are automatically inflicted.

cards.title: SAVAGE ECHOES

body.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was just charged by an enemy unit.
body.effect: Select either the Strength or Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit. Until the end of the turn, add 1 to the selected characteristic. You can instead choose for your unit to give in to the Red Thirst; if it does, it becomes Battle-shocked (but the effects of this Stratagem still apply to it) and until the end of the turn, add 1 to the Strength and Attacks characteristics of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit.

cards.type: Liberator Assault Group – Battle Tactic Stratagem

cards.title: RED RAMPAGE

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Select either the [LANCE] or [LETHAL HITS] abilities. Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the selected ability. You can instead choose for your unit to give in to the Red Thirst; if it does, then it becomes Battle-shocked (but the effects of this Stratagem still apply to it) and until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LANCE] and [LETHAL HITS] abilities.

cards.title: RELENTLESS ASSAULT

body.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army Falls Back.
body.target: That ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to either shoot or declare a charge even though it Fell Back. You can instead choose for your unit to give in to the Red Thirst; if it does, it becomes Battle-shocked (but the effects of this Stratagem still apply to it) and until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to both shoot and declare a charge, even though it Fell Back.

cards.title: STRENGTH IN UNITY

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: If that enemy unit is within Engagement Range of one or more RAVENWING units from your army, until the end of the phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll. If that enemy unit is within Engagement Range of one or more DEATHWING units from your army, until the end of the phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes an attack, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of the target, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.
body.restriction: A unit cannot be targeted by this and the Armour of Contempt Stratagem in the same phase.

cards.title: INESCAPABLE WRATH

body.when: End of your opponent’s Charge phase.
body.target: One DEATHWING INFANTRY or DEATHWING WALKER unit from your army that is within 6" of one or more enemy units and would be eligible to declare a charge against one or more of those enemy units if it were your Charge phase.
body.effect: Your unit now declares a charge that only targets one or more of those enemy units, and you resolve that charge.
body.restriction: Note that even if this charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

cards.title: IMPETUOSITY

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One WULFEN INFANTRY or BLOOD CLAWS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, after that enemy unit has shot, if one or more models in your unit were destroyed as a result of those attacks, your unit can make an Impetuous move. To do so, roll one D6: your unit can be moved a number of inches up to the result, but your unit must end that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit (excluding AIRCRAFT). When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.

cards.title: IMPETUOSITY

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One WULFEN INFANTRY or BLOOD CLAWS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, after that enemy unit has shot, if one or more models in your unit were destroyed as a result of those attacks, your unit can make an Impetuous move. To do so, roll one D6: your unit can be moved a number of inches up to the result, but your unit must end that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit (excluding AIRCRAFT). When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.

cards.title: SHOCK CAVALRY

body.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
body.target: One THUNDERWOLF CAVALRY unit from your army that has not been selected to move or declared a charge this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move, it can move through models (excluding TITANIC models) and sections of terrain features that are 4" or less in height. When doing so, it can move within Engagement Range of enemy models, but unless it is making a Charge move, it cannot end that move within Engagement Range of them.

body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, after your unit has shot, select one enemy CHARACTER, MONSTER, or VEHICLE unit hit by one or more of those attacks. body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED or ADEPTUS ASTARTES VEHICLE unit (excluding WALKERS) from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, if your unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit, or 9" instead if your unit is MOUNTED.

body.target: One TERMINATOR SQUAD unit from your army that has not fired Overwatch this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack while firing Overwatch, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ is required to score a hit, instead of an unmodified 6.

body.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
body.target: One TERMINATOR ASSAULT SQUAD unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase and has not declared a charge this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, when making a Normal, Advance or Charge move, your unit can move through a single closed Hatchway as if it was open. When doing so, that Hatchway is opened and cannot be closed for the rest of the battle. This can allow that unit to declare a charge against enemy units that are not visible to it, but to do so those enemy units must be within 1" of that Hatchway and wholly on the opposite side of it from your unit.
body.restriction: You cannot use this Stratagem more than once per turn.

body.effect: Until the end of the phase, when setting up your unit on the battlefield using its Deep Strike ability, you can set it up unit anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy models (measure this distance as you would normally for the Deep Strike ability, ignoring Walls and closed Hatchways).

cards.title: FURIOUS ONSLAUGHT

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One DEATH COMPANY unit from your army, just before that unit Piles-in.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in move, it can move up to D3+3" instead of up to 3". If your unit is within 12" of one or more friendly CHAPLAIN models, or if it is below Starting Strength, it can move up to 6" instead. In either case, it can only do so provided your unit ends that Pile-in move in Unit Coherency and within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

cards.title: FINAL RETRIBUTION

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One DEATH COMPANY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if your unit is within 12" of one or more friendly CHAPLAIN models; on a 4+, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

cards.title: UNFORGIVEN FURY

body.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability. In addition, if one or more ADEPTUS ASTARTES units from your army are currently Battle-shocked, until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

cards.title: GRIM RETRIBUTION

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that had one or more models destroyed as a result of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but it must target the enemy unit that just attacked it, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

body.restriction: Each unit selected for this Stratagem must be more than 3" away from all enemy models.

body.when: Start of the Command phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY or ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army within range of an objective marker you control.
body.effect: That objective marker is said to be Sabotaged, and remains under your control even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn. While an objective marker is Sabotaged and under your control, each time an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move within range of that objective marker, roll one D6: on a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

cards.type: Vindication Task Force – Battle Tactic Stratagem

cards.title: REFUSAL TO YIELD

body.when: Any phase, just after an ANCIENT model from your army is destroyed.
body.target: That ANCIENT model. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
body.effect: At the end of the phase, set your model back up on the battlefield, as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, with its full wounds remaining.
body.restriction: You cannot target the same model with this Stratagem more than once per battle.

cards.title: RECLAIM OUR HONOUR!

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit destroys an ANCIENT model from your army that has not been targeted with the Refusal to Yield Stratagem this phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army visible to that enemy unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the battle, each time an ADEPTUS ASTARTES model from your army makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, add 1 to the Hit roll.
body.restriction: You cannot target that ANCIENT model with the Refusal to Yield Stratagem this phase.

cards.title: PERFERVID INTERVENTION

body.when: End of your opponent’s Charge phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that is within 6" of one or more enemy units and would be eligible to declare a charge against one or more of those enemy units if it were your Charge phase.
body.effect: Your unit now declares a charge that only targets one or more of those enemy units, and you resolve that charge.
body.restriction: Note that even if this charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

body.target: One THOUSAND SONS unit from your army.
body.effect: До конца фазы, each time an enemy model within Engagement Range of your unit selects targets for its attacks, it can only target your unit if there are no eligible SCINTILLATING LEGIONS targets for those attacks.

cards.title: ETHEREAL PHANTASM

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
body.target: One SCINTILLATING LEGIONS unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6", or a Normal move of up to 6" instead if it is wholly within 6" of one or more friendly THOUSAND SONS units.

cards.title: CHRONOSORCEROUS BLEED

body.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit has declared a charge.
body.target: One THOUSAND SONS PSYKER or SCINTILLATING LEGIONS unit from your army that was selected as a target of that charge.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for that enemy unit (this is not cumulative with any other negative modifiers to that Charge roll).

cards.title: GLIMMERSHIFT PORTAL

body.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
body.target: Up to two SCINTILLATING LEGIONS units from your army (excluding MONSTERS), or one SCINTILLATING LEGIONS MONSTER unit from your army, if all of those units are more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units.
body.effect: Remove those units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One RUBRIC MARINES or SCARAB OCCULT TERMINATORS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Select one closed Hatchway. Until the end of the phase, models in your unit can make attacks with ranged weapons (excluding Torrent weapons) that target enemy units within 1" of that Hatchway and that are wholly on the opposite side of it from your unit, as if that Hatchway was open. Each time a model does so, that attack has an Armour Penetration characteristic of 0.

body.when: Your opponent’s Command phase, at the start of the Battle-shock step.
body.target: One THOUSAND SONS CHARACTER or TZAANGORS unit from your army.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit below its Starting Strength that is within Engagement Range of your unit. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test. If that enemy unit is also Below Half-strength, subtract 1 from that test. This Enhancement cannot cause a unit to take two Battle-shock tests in the same phase.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
body.target: One TZAANGORS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Your unit can make a Bestial Surge move. To do so, roll one D6: your unit can be moved a distance in inches up to the result, but must end that move as close as possible to the attacking unit. When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit, but only that enemy unit.

body.when: Start of your opponent’s Movement phase.
body.target: One THOUSAND SONS PSYKER model from your army.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit visible to your model. That unit must take a Leadership test, subtracting 1 from the result: if failed, until the start of your opponent’s next Movement phase, subtract 2" from the Move characteristic of models in that unit and subtract 2 from Advance and Charge rolls made for it; if passed, subtract 1" from the Move characteristic of models in that unit and subtract 1 from Advance and Charge rolls made for it.

body.when: Fight phase, just after a TZEENTCH MUTANT unit from your army is selected to fight.

cards.title: MEET FORCE WITH FORCE

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
body.target: One WORLD EATERS INFANTRY, WORLD EATERS MOUNTED or WORLD EATERS DAEMON PRINCE unit from your army that lost one or more wounds as a result of those attacks.
body.effect: Your unit can make a Blood Surge move. To do so, roll one D6: models in your unit move a number of inches up to the result, but your unit must end that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit (excluding AIRCRAFT). When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit. If your unit is a KHORNE BERZERKERS or VESSEL OF WRATH unit, you can re-roll the D6 to determine how far your unit can move.
